qrScanner.title: Scan benn lëkkalekaay
qrScanner.instruction: Wut sa kamera ci QR code bi ci lëkkalekaay bi
qrScanner.artworkNotFound: Lëkkalekaay bi amuul. Xoolal QR code bi.
qrScanner.cameraError: Manuñu jël kamera bi. Xoolal permissions yi.

tips.title: Ndimbal ngir scan bu baax
tips.light: Jëkk ni amnga benn lumière bu baax
tips.stable: Tëral sa aparey bi mu nekk mu jaadu

collections.title: Suñu Lëkkalekaay yi
collections.subtitle: Giseel li njool ci Musée des Civilisations Noires
collections.noResults: Amuñu gis lëkkalekaay bu amul ni ci seet bi

hero.title: Musée des Civilisations Noires
hero.subtitle: Giseel aada bu Afrik ci benn fann bu bees

featured.title: Lëkkalekaay yu bari
featured.subtitle: Giseel suñu lëkkalekaay yi ñu gën a bari

features.title: Benn xeetu bu wër
features.subtitle: Gis suñu fonctionnalités yu bees ngir am benn xeetu bu gën

scan.title: Scan QR Code
scan.description: Scan QR code yi ngir am xalaat yu bari ci yoon bu gaaw

multilingual.title: Ay lakk yu bari
multilingual.description: Xalaat yi amnañu ko ci Fränsee, Angéle ak Wolof

audio.title: Guide audio
audio.description: Deglu ay xalaat ngir am benn xeetu bu gën

about.title: Ci sunñu
about.subtitle: Gis suñu misin ak suñu projee

museum.title: Musée des Civilisations Noires
museum.description: Musée des Civilisations Noires mooy benn ci espace yu mag yu aada ci Sénégal ak Afrik. Am na patrimoine bu njool bu war a am ci biir néeg yi. Benen sa bi mooy melokaan na loxo bu bees bu aada yu Afrik ci yoon yi lépp.

project.title: Projee Musée 2.0
project.description: Musée 2.0 mooy benn plateforme digital bu bees bu di wut xeetu gën ci musée bi. Suñu xeltu mooy jox ay xalaat yu aada ci néeg yi lépp te melokaan patrimoine bi ci gina biir musée bi.

features.title: Li ñu di def
features.scan: Scan QR Code ngir am xalaat yu bari
features.multilingual: Xalaat ci ay lakk yu bari (Fränsee, Angéle, Wolof)
features.audio: Guide audio ngir benn xeetu bu gën
features.accessible: Manñu ko am ci lu nekk, ci musée walla ci kaw

hackathon.title: Hackathon Dakar Slush'D
hackathon.description: Projee bii ñu ko def ci Hackathon bu Senstartup organise ak Musée des Civilisations Noires ci Dakar Slush'D (09-10 Oktoobar 2025).

audioPlayer.title: Deglu saññ-saññ bi
audioPlayer.useTTSInstead: Jëfandikoo bind bu mat ci sa bopp
audioPlayer.demoMode: Mode demo: Deglu goo jëfandikoo bindu sa navigateur. Ngir xol bu gën, ay fichier audio yu profeesyonel dinañ yees.

footer.description: Xool patrimoine bu aada bu Afrik ci benn xeetu digital bu bees.
footer.rights: Lépp ay sag yi am nañu ko
footer.hackathon: Projee bi ñu ko def ngir

aiAssistant.title: Jëfandikoo IA
aiAssistant.subtitle: Laaj sa laaj
aiAssistant.welcomeMessage: Nanga def! Maa ngi sa guide virtuel bu Musée des Civilisations Noires. Laajal ma ci lëkkalekaay yi, tarih yi ak aadaa yu Afrik!
aiAssistant.demoResponse: Jërëjëf ci sa laaj! API IA dinañ ko intégré ci yoon yu bess ngir joxe sa yeen yi ak detay yu bari ci lëkkalekaay yi.
aiAssistant.placeholder: Misaal: Wax ma ci Masque Gelede...
aiAssistant.disclaimer: Assistant bi dafa xam musée rekk
